https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4kTS3R0NR7Y5t1OpIuVWURlFYBF.jpg After being dumped by her boyfriend just before their 100-day anniversary, Ha-young meets a college guy named Hyung-joon when she kicks a can that accidentally hits him in the face and causes him to scratch his Lexus. He demands she pay him $3000 on the spot. 100 Days with Mr. Arrogant
